episodes.title: Japan's Most Dangerous Cult: Aum Shinrikyo (Full Documentary)
episodes.description:
#charliedogwood  #japanesehistory #japan #history  

In 1994 and 1995, the cult known as Aum Shinrikyo led by 'yoga guru' Asahara Shoko (麻原彰晃) launched a series of attacks in Japan, first starting with the Matsumoto Sarin Incident and then the Tokyo Subway Sarin Gas Attacks. It was an unprecedent series of attacks, utilizing poison gas to attack random people. 

For what reason, for what purpose? 

Here's the full story of Aum Shinrikyo and Asahara Shoko...

A History Documentary by Charlie Dogwood, 2024

I guess this counts as true crime? It's a cult so I guess it counts, right?

Chapters:
0:00 Intro
0:19 Early Life of Asahara (aka Matsumoto Chizuo)
2:24 Occult Teachings
4:02 Asahara Shoko the Yoga Guru
9:30 Early Aum Shinrikyo
13:24 The Crisis of 1989
15:47 Political Guru & the Land Purchase Incident
17:26 Gaining Respectability
19:44 The Weapons & Gas Program
21:18 Aum Anime
22:53 Dakini
23:56 Paranoia and Sarin
25:09 The Matsumoto Sarin Incident
30:40 Plotting the Attack
31:57 The Tokyo Subway Sarin Gas Attack
41:26 The Aum Trials
44:10 The End of Asahara Shoko
45:51 Outro/Credits
